comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.

issue.title: com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

since we dont block events.data.microsoft.com in the dns list i suggest we start blocking for individual apps. blocking events.data.microsoft.com for apps is ok the only issue we had was with xbox and that was dns. so app basis is fine.

suggested filters:
|browser.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||self.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||mobile.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Language-specific:

comment.body:
Unfortunately, It can't be checked without an account. Is it caused by this rule `/.*/$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=(),document` or the `AdGuard Tracking Protection`?
If it's caused by the rule, please check one of this rules.
```adblock
@@||netshoes.com.br/auth/$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=()
@@||netshoes.com.br^$permissions=join-ad-interest-group=()
```

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. Only when AdGuard is paused.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will break configuration process.
